USDC is a digital US dollar created by Circle and backed 1:1 by US dollar reserves held at regulated financial institutions. Every USDC is worth exactly $1. items.q: What if I lose my phone?
items.a: When you create your wallet, you get a 12-word recovery phrase. Write it down and keep it safe. If you lose your phone, install the app on a new device and enter your recovery phrase to restore your wallet and all your funds. No one else can access your money without this phrase â€” not even MVGA.
